document.full_text: california's largest companies spend less than a third of what the state government spends on pensions and other benefits for retired workers, a study released on thursday concluded as a fight over the costs of public-sector pensions intensified.
document.title: combatants in california pension battle trade blows
lines_and_colors: california's largest companies spend less than a third of what the state government spends on pensions and other benefits for retired workers, a study released on thursday concluded as a fight over the costs of public-sector pensions intensified.
